ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of RICHARD McGAW of Fredericton, New Brunswick, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2011, in the place of Gilles Lepage, effective March 1, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
